mapper.select: SELECT grp_cd, grp_nm, grp_level, (CASE WHEN supragrp_cd = '' OR supragrp_cd IS NULL THEN '#' ELSE supragrp_cd END) supragrp_cd FROM nvusergrp WHERE active_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY grp_cd
SELECT grp_cd, grp_nm, func_code, func_desc, active_yn, permit_dt, permit_sts FROM nvusergrp WHERE active_yn = 'Y' AND accept_yn = 'Y' AND permit_sts is not null
SELECT grp_cd, grp_nm, func_code, func_desc, active_yn, permit_dt, permit_sts FROM nvusergrp WHERE active_yn IN ('N','R') AND accept_yn = 'Y'
SELECT grp_cd, grp_nm, func_code, func_desc, active_yn, permit_dt, permit_sts FROM nvusergrp WHERE active_yn = 'Y' AND accept_yn = 'N'

SELECT grp_cd, grp_nm, grp_desc, (CASE WHEN supragrp_cd = '' OR supragrp_cd IS NULL THEN '#' ELSE supragrp_cd END) supragrp_cd ,active_yn, coalesce(manager_id, '') manager_id, coalesce(manager_nm, '') manager_nm , (SELECT CASE count(*) WHEN 0 THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END FROM nvusergrp b WHERE b.supragrp_cd = a.grp_cd AND b.active_yn = 'Y') haschildren FROM nvusergrp a WHERE active_yn = 'Y'
AND supragrp_cd = #{id}
AND supragrp_cd IS NULL
ORDER BY grp_cd
